events.message: We have received an application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate, including their resume and cover letter highlighting their experience in backend development.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to keywords such as software, developer, and backend experience found in the candidate's profile.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to the candidate's case to proceed with further evaluation and communication.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate's technical skills, experience with devops tools, and cultural fit for our software engineering team.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the initial screening, expressing strong interest in the role and eagerness to participate in the technical interview process.
A technical interview with the senior engineering panel has been scheduled for the candidate to further evaluate software development and devops capabilities.
